sentences.en: Do not confuse the two or se - rious, long - lasting hard feelings could ensue.
sentences.cn: 千万别把两者混淆,否则必生怨恨之心, 伤害极深且挥之难去.

sentences.en: If it were to cease trading, chaos could ensue.
sentences.cn: 如果雷曼停止交易, 那么市场混乱便会随之发生.

sentences.en: If the Europeans did not reduce subsidies, a trade war would ensue.
sentences.cn: 如果欧洲人不减少补贴，便会发生贸易战。

sentences.en: If we can't bring our problems under control, feelings of powerlessness and despair often ensue.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不能解决自己的问题，往往会感到无能为力和绝望。

sentences.en: Let him seek peace and ensue it!
sentences.cn: 让他去追求和平并为和平而奔波吧.

sentences.en: Otherwise, inundation would ensue to our dismay.
sentences.cn: 若不疏导, 只能眼巴巴看着它泛滥.

sentences.en: There's no telling how many non - battle casualties might ensue.
sentences.cn: 到时候, 非 战斗减员不知有多少呢!

sentences.en: They are still unaware of what will ensue from this hasty action.
sentences.cn: 他们尚未意识到这样草率的行为会带来的后果.

sentences.en: Trouble will ensue if wind of this scandal gets out.
sentences.cn: 这件丑事一露出风声便会招来麻烦.

sentences.en: What will ensue from [ on ] this?
sentences.cn: 这会产生什么 结果 呢 ?

sentences.en: What will ensue from / on these actions?
sentences.cn: 这样的行动会产生什么结果 呢 ?

sentences.en: Who knows what a bother may ensue from overpopulation?
sentences.cn: 谁知道人口过剩会带来什么麻烦?

sentences.en: Who knows what troubles may ensue from air pollution?
sentences.cn: 谁知道空气污染可能造成什么样的灾难 呢 ?

sentences.en: You do not ask whether the defendant believed damage would ensue.
sentences.cn: 你不要问是否这个被告追求这样的损害.

trans.tran_en: to happen after or as a result of something

trans.tran_cn: 接着发生， 接踵而来， 因而产生
trans.tran_en: to happen after or as a result of something
